short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use it as you like it, a better css for youtube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When ever you are watching a video on youtube, you would want to scroll through the suggestions shown beside the video, but at presently the website is such that you can only see through all the suggestions while scrolling through the whole page, while you missing the video, This extension helps you add a tiny bit of css to make you not miss a thing :).
Happy youtubing.
